titleStmt.title: Considerations upon a printed sheet entituled the speech of the late Lord Russel to the sheriffs together, with the paper delivered by him to them, at the place of execution, on July 21. 1683.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for Joanna Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to Sir Roger L'Estrange. cf. NUC pre-1956.
